page.title: 01Family Life in this Area
page.content: My father has to get up for work and a little bit later I get up.My mother and my sister are last.My father has cornflakes and a cup of tea.I have a fried breakfast and a drink from the Sodastream,a machine that uses gas to make fizzy drinks.My mother just has a bacon sandwich for breakfast.Then I pack my bag for school. After school I get changed and have tea.Sometimes I read but other times I go out and play.My father gets home from work at a quarter past five.Then I stay with him until he goes to work again at seven.My mother gets home from her job at eight o'clock.At ten o'clock I go to bed.
